speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Brothers and sisters, I will now present to you the General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers of the Church for your sustaining vote.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain Russell Marion Nelson as prophet, seer, and revelator and President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints; Dallin Harris Oaks as First Counselor in the First Presidency; and Henry Bennion Eyring as Second Counselor in the First Presidency.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those opposed, if any, may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain Dallin H. Oaks as President of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles and M. Russell Ballard as Acting President of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor, please signify.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the following as members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles: M. Russell Ballard, Jeffrey R. Holland, Dieter F. Uchtdorf, David A. Bednar, Quentin L. Cook, D. Todd Christofferson, Neil L. Andersen, Ronald A. Rasband, Gary E. Stevenson, Dale G. Renlund, Gerrit W. Gong, and Ulisses Soares.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed may so indicate.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the counselors in the First Presidency and the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles as prophets, seers, and revelators.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Contrary, if there be any, by the same sign.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: We have released Elders L. Whitney Clayton, Enrique R. Falabella, and Richard J. Maynes as General Authority Seventies and grant them emeritus status.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those who wish to join with us in expressing gratitude to these Brethren and to their families for their remarkable service, please so manifest.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: We have released Elder L. Todd Budge as a General Authority Seventy.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All who wish to thank him for his service, please do so by the uplifted hand.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: We have released Bishops Dean M. Davies and W. Christopher Waddell as First and Second Counselors, respectively, in the Presiding Bishopric.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All who wish to express appreciation to these Brethren for their dedicated service may so indicate.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: We have released the following as Area Seventies: Ruben Acosta, René R. Alba, Alberto A. Alvarez, Vladimir N. Astashov, José Batalla, Bradford C. Bowen, Sergio Luis Carboni, Armando Carreón, S. Marc Clay Jr., Z. Dominique Dekaye, Osvaldo R. Dias, Michael M. Dudley, Mark P. Durham, E. Xavier Espinoza, James E. Evanson, Paschoal F. Fortunato, Sam M. Galvez, Patricio M. Giuffra, Leonard D. Greer, Daniel P. Hall, Toru Hayashi, Paul F. Hintze, Adolf J. Johansson, Wisit Khanakham, Seung Hoon Koo, Pedro X. Larreal, Johnny L. Leota, José E. Maravilla, Joel Martinez, Joaquim J. Moreira, Isaac K. Morrison, Eduardo A. Norambuena, Ferdinand P. Pangan, Jairus C. Perez, Steven M. Petersen, Jay D. Pimentel, Edvaldo B. Pinto Jr., Alexey V. Samaykin, K. David Scott, Rulon F. Stacey, Karl M. Tilleman, William R. Titera, Carlos R. Toledo, Cesar E. Villar, David T. Warner, Gary K. Wilde, and William B. Woahn.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those who wish to join us in expressing appreciation for their excellent service, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: With Elder L. Whitney Clayton being released as a General Authority Seventy and being granted emeritus status, he has also been released as a member of the Presidency of the Seventy.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Elder Brent H. Nielson has been called as a member of the Presidency of the Seventy, and we propose that he be sustained.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed, please indicate.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain Dean M. Davies as a General Authority Seventy.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed may so signify.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain W. Christopher Waddell to serve as First Counselor in the Presiding Bishopric and L. Todd Budge to serve as Second Counselor in the Presiding Bishopric.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Any opposed, by the same sign.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the following as new Area Seventies: Laurian P. Balilemwa, Jonathon W. Bunker, Enrique R. Mayorga, and Konstantin Tolomeev.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those in favor may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those opposed, if any, may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: It is proposed that we sustain the other General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers of the Church as presently constituted.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: All in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Contrary, if there be any, by the same sign.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Those who opposed any of the proposals should contact their stake president.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Sustaining of General Authorities, Area Seventies, and General Officers
paragraph_text: Brothers and sisters, we express gratitude for your continued faith and prayers in behalf of the leaders of the Church.
